review: Hey I really like the concept of this, but..... It does not work reliably enough to switch away from a Roku or other device.  I am not a Amazon Prime customer and maybe that is exactly who needs this device.  We watch Netflix and Hulu and both of those applications had issues and buffering problems.  It fun to watch videos on your tablets, but sometimes you want to watch a movie on something larger than a 27" screen.

review: Super disappointed in this product!  We bought this to use with our TV's without the smart capability, this won't even stay connected to the Internet.  We've tried it at multiple locations, it just constantly disconnects.  Save your money for a smart tv.

review: Plugged it all in, went through the automatic tutorial, it quit working immediately thereafter and then my tv/cable ( Comcast ) ceased to work.  Call it a coincidence, but fact is my tv and all channels were working just fine immediately prior to installing the Firestick and then blew up immediately after installing the Dipstick.  Returning it and going to buy a new smart tv like I should have done in the first place.
